00020 
00021 #ifndef __TBB_mutex_H
00022 #define __TBB_mutex_H
00023 
00024 #if _WIN32||_WIN64
00025 #include <windows.h>
00026 #if !defined(_WIN32_WINNT)
00027 // The following Windows API function is declared explicitly;
00028 // otherwise any user would have to specify /D_WIN32_WINNT=0x0400
00029 extern "C" BOOL WINAPI TryEnterCriticalSection( LPCRITICAL_SECTION );
00030 #endif
00031 
00032 #else /* if not _WIN32||_WIN64 */
00033 #include <pthread.h>
00034 namespace tbb { namespace internal {
00035 // Use this internal TBB function to throw an exception
00036 extern void handle_perror( int error_code, const char* what );
00037 } } //namespaces
00038 #endif /* _WIN32||_WIN64 */
00039 
00040 #include "tbb_stddef.h"
00041 
00042 namespace tbb {
00043 
00045 
00047 class mutex {
00048 public:
00050     mutex() {
00051 #if TBB_USE_ASSERT
00052     internal_construct();
00053 #else
00054   #if _WIN32||_WIN64
00055         InitializeCriticalSection(&impl);
00056   #else
00057         int error_code = pthread_mutex_init(&impl,NULL);
00058         if( error_code )
00059             tbb::internal::handle_perror(error_code,"mutex: pthread_mutex_init failed");
00060   #endif /* _WIN32||_WIN64*/
00061 #endif /* TBB_USE_ASSERT */
00062     };
00063 
00064     ~mutex() {
00065 #if TBB_USE_ASSERT
00066         internal_destroy();
00067 #else
00068   #if _WIN32||_WIN64
00069         DeleteCriticalSection(&impl);
00070   #else
00071         pthread_mutex_destroy(&impl); 
00072 
00073   #endif /* _WIN32||_WIN64 */
00074 #endif /* TBB_USE_ASSERT */
00075     };
00076 
00077     class scoped_lock;
00078     friend class scoped_lock;
00079 
00081 
00083     class scoped_lock : private internal::no_copy {
00084     public:
00086         scoped_lock() : my_mutex(NULL) {};
00087 
00089 
00090         scoped_lock( mutex& mutex ) {
00091             acquire( mutex );
00092         }
00093 
00095         ~scoped_lock() {
00096             if( my_mutex ) 
00097                 release();
00098         }
00099 
00101         void acquire( mutex& mutex ) {
00102 #if TBB_USE_ASSERT
00103             internal_acquire(mutex);
00104 #else
00105             my_mutex = &mutex;
00106   #if _WIN32||_WIN64
00107             EnterCriticalSection(&mutex.impl);
00108   #else
00109             pthread_mutex_lock(&mutex.impl);
00110   #endif /* _WIN32||_WIN64 */
00111 #endif /* TBB_USE_ASSERT */
00112         }
00113 
00115         bool try_acquire( mutex& mutex ) {
00116 #if TBB_USE_ASSERT
00117             return internal_try_acquire (mutex);
00118 #else
00119             bool result;
00120   #if _WIN32||_WIN64
00121             result = TryEnterCriticalSection(&mutex.impl)!=0;
00122   #else
00123             result = pthread_mutex_trylock(&mutex.impl)==0;
00124   #endif /* _WIN32||_WIN64 */
00125             if( result )
00126                 my_mutex = &mutex;
00127             return result;
00128 #endif /* TBB_USE_ASSERT */
00129         }
00130 
00132         void release() {
00133 #if TBB_USE_ASSERT
00134             internal_release ();
00135 #else
00136   #if _WIN32||_WIN64
00137             LeaveCriticalSection(&my_mutex->impl);
00138   #else
00139             pthread_mutex_unlock(&my_mutex->impl);
00140   #endif /* _WIN32||_WIN64 */
00141             my_mutex = NULL;
00142 #endif /* TBB_USE_ASSERT */
00143         }
00144 
00145     private:
00147         mutex* my_mutex;
00148 
00150         void __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD internal_acquire( mutex& m );
00151 
00153         bool __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD internal_try_acquire( mutex& m );
00154 
00156         void __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD internal_release();
00157     };
00158 
00159     // Mutex traits
00160     static const bool is_rw_mutex = false;
00161     static const bool is_recursive_mutex = false;
00162     static const bool is_fair_mutex = false;
00163 
00164 private:
00165 #if _WIN32||_WIN64
00166     CRITICAL_SECTION impl;    
00167     enum state_t {
00168         INITIALIZED=0x1234,
00169         DESTROYED=0x789A,
00170         HELD=0x56CD
00171     } state;
00172 #else
00173     pthread_mutex_t impl;
00174 #endif /* _WIN32||_WIN64 */
00175 
00177     void __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD internal_construct();
00178 
00180     void __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD internal_destroy();
00181 };
00182 
00183 } // namespace tbb 
00184 
00185 #endif /* __TBB_mutex_H */
